reg_pit.title: Adjustment Factors Relating to the Valuation of Railway Corporation Property Regulation

change.changenote: Regulation BEFORE repealed by BC Reg 51/2016, effective March 2, 2016.

reg:regulation.reg:title: Adjustment Factors Relating to the Valuation of Railway Corporation Property Regulation

bcl:definition.bcl:text: general tax base means the taxable assessed values on which property taxes under the Municipal Act are levied;
hospital tax base means the taxable assessed values on which property taxes under the Hospital District Act are levied;
school tax base means the taxable assessed values on which property taxes under the School Act are levied.

bcl:section.bcl:text: This regulation does not apply to railway corporation property situated north of 59 degrees north latitude.
In the 1997 taxation year the following adjustment factors apply:

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: for taxes levied on the school tax base, the adjustment factor for each of the categories of railway corporation property listed in this paragraph is set out to the right of the name for the category:

subject to paragraph (c), for taxes levied on the general and the hospital tax bases, the adjustment factor for each of the categories of railway corporation property listed in this paragraph is set out beside the name for the category:

oasis:entry.oasis:line: Right of way in incorporated areas
Right of way in unincorporated areas
Track in place in incorporated areas
Track in place in unincorporated areas

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: for taxes levied on the general and hospital tax base in each of the jurisdictions listed in Schedule 1, the adjustment factors for track in place, right of way and bridges respectively are set out to the right of the name of the jurisdiction.

bcl:section.bcl:text: In the 1998 taxation year the following adjustment factors apply:

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: for taxes levied on the school tax base, the adjustment factor for each of the categories of railway corporation property listed in this paragraph is set out to the right of the name for the category:

subject to paragraph (c), for taxes levied on the general and the hospital tax bases, the adjustment factor for each of the categories of railway corporation property listed in this paragraph is set out beside the name for the category:

oasis:entry.oasis:line: Right of way in incorporated areas
Right of way in unincorporated areas
Track in place in incorporated areas
Track in place in unincorporated areas

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: for taxes levied on the general and hospital tax base in each of the jurisdictions listed in Schedule 2, the adjustment factors for track in place, right of way and bridges respectively are set out to the right of the name of the jurisdiction.

bcl:section.bcl:text: In the 1999 taxation year the following adjustment factors apply:

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: for taxes levied on the school tax base, the adjustment factor for each of the categories of railway corporation property listed in this paragraph is set out to the right of the name for the category:

subject to paragraph (c), for taxes levied on the general and the hospital tax bases, the adjustment factor for each of the categories of railway corporation property listed in this paragraph is set out beside the name for the category:

oasis:entry.oasis:line: Right of way in incorporated areas
Right of way in unincorporated areas
Track in place in incorporated areas
Track in place in unincorporated areas

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: for taxes levied on the general and hospital tax base in each of the jurisdictions listed in Schedule 3, the adjustment factors for track in place, right of way and bridges respectively are set out to the right of the name of the jurisdiction.

bcl:section.bcl:text: In the 2000 taxation year and subsequent years the following adjustment factors apply:

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: for taxes levied on the school tax base, the adjustment factor for each of the categories of railway corporation property listed in this paragraph is set out to the right of the name for the category:

subject to paragraph (c), for taxes levied on the general and the hospital tax bases, the adjustment factor for each of the categories of railway corporation property listed in this paragraph is set out beside the name for the category:

oasis:entry.oasis:line: Right of way in incorporated areas
Right of way in unincorporated areas
Track in place in incorporated areas
Track in place in unincorporated areas

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: for taxes levied on the general and hospital tax base in each of the jurisdictions listed in Schedule 4, the adjustment factors for track in place, right of way and bridges respectively are set out to the right of the name of the jurisdiction.
